trans-unit.source: Represents the status of an application's network connection.
trans-unit.target: 代表應用程式的網路連線的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use the ConnectivityStatus class to specify the network connectivity of Windows-based applications that use client application services.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ConnectivityStatus 類別來指定使用用戶端應用程式服務的 Windows 架構應用程式的網路連線。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ConnectivityStatus.IsOffline%2A> property to `true`, the client service providers use the offline cache instead of attempting to access the corresponding Web services.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ConnectivityStatus.IsOffline%2A>屬性`true`，用戶端服務提供者用於離線快取而不是嘗試存取對應的 Web 服務。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ConnectivityStatus.IsOffline%2A>

trans-unit.source: The offline status is stored on a per-user and per-application basis.
trans-unit.target: 離線狀態會儲存個別使用者和每個應用程式的基礎。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Work Offline with Client Application Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f792cb16-8520-4a0f-9dc9-07bfbc454e38).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 離線使用用戶端應用程式服務的工作](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f792cb16-8520-4a0f-9dc9-07bfbc454e38)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an application is in offline mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式是否處於離線模式。

trans-unit.source: When you set the IsOffline property, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ConnectivityStatus> class caches the value to the local file system.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定 IsOffline 屬性<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ConnectivityStatus>類別會快取至本機檔案系統的值。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ConnectivityStatus>

trans-unit.source: The client service providers in the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers> namespace check this value to determine whether to use the offline data cache instead of attempting to access the associated [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)] authentication, roles, and profile services.
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端服務提供者<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers>命名空間，請檢查此值可判斷是否要使用離線資料快取而不是嘗試存取相關聯[!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)]驗證、 角色和設定檔服務。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the application is in offline mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應用程式處於離線模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
